name: A. Minimal Coprime
input: InputEach test contains multiple test cases. The first line contains the number of test cases $$$t$$$ ($$$1 \le t \le 100$$$). The description of the test cases follows. The only line of each test case consists of two integers $$$l$$$ and $$$r$$$ ($$$1 \le l \le r \le 10^9$$$).
output: OutputFor each test case, output the number of minimal coprime segments contained in $$$[l,r]$$$, on a separate line.
